department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: [Expired] Vehicle Inspection Services needed by DND for 4 Wing's Commercial Fleet.
description: **AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: PLEASE DISREGARD THE Ariba DISCOVERY POSTING DEADLINE CLOSING TIME AND CANADABUYS POSTING CLOSING TIME**The Department of National Defence (DND) Royal Canadian Electrical Mechanical Engineers (RCEME) in Cold Lake Alberta requires technical support to perform vehicle inspections on 4 Wing’s Commercial Fleet. This support will involve both the Contractor’s shop location and RCEME’s garage located within a Restricted Area, on an as and when needed basis.
full_summary:
### Invitation to Bid
#### Standing Offer Request

This invitation to bid is issued by the Department of Public Works and Government Services, on behalf of the Department of National Defence, under the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), and Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP).

#### Tender Details

* **Solicitation Number**: WS4141682965
* **Publication Date**: September 26, 2023
* **Closing Date**: October 19, 2023 (1400 EDT)
* **Contract Value:** To be determined
* **Duration:** To be determined
* **Location:** Cold Lake, Alberta
* **Scope:** Technical support services to perform vehicle inspections on 4 Wing’s Commercial Fleet.

#### Service Requirements

The successful bidder will be required to provide technical support services to perform vehicle inspections at the Royal Canadian Electrical Mechanical Engineers (RCEME) garage in a Restricted Area, and at the Contractor’s shop location, both on an as and when needed basis.

#### Evaluation Criteria

The evaluation criteria will be based on the lowest price submitted.

#### Procurement Method

This procurement will be conducted through a Competitive Open Bidding process.

#### Contact Information

Rachinski, Douglas (SPAC/PSPC)
douglas.rachinski@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
[No Phone Number]

#### Notice URL

https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17553629?extsite=MTc1NTM2MjlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Agency Contact: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5.

### End User

Department of National Defence (DND), 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2, Canada.
